Texto: 
two liver masses on ct imaging
none to date
two liver masses as shown - suspicious for hepatocellular carcinoma with central necrosis in larger lesion.
hepatocellular carcinoma - radiology and cytology correlation
• hepatocellular carcinoma
• fibrolamellar carcinoma
• metastases
65 year old  man with a history of hepatitis b, afp >100 ng/ml, ? cirrhosis with low platelets
